title: The Fallen
description: Death is only the Beginning. It is her job to protect the balance above anything else, even at the risk of her own existence. So when Nivian keeps seeing the presence of one of the dark guardians, she is determined to be the hunter, not the hunted.Though tasked with working alongside the dark guardians, trust is not freely given. Especially when their sudden, lingering presence in her life makes her wonder if death is coming for her.An unexpected friendship arises when Nivian is caught in the middle of a fight for power that endangers everything they've all been fighting to protect. But betrayal will threaten to take everything from Nivian when one side goes too far.Caught between the two warring sides, Nivian is forced to make a choice that will forever change their destinies.
author: Ali Winters
